name: Kabu San
description:
Get ready for some action with Kabu San and his friends!

Catch all the cute little beans you can before you lose all of your lives, but beware of the bad guys that can explode right on your face!

Compete with your friends, unlock lot's of characters and worlds and share your progress with everyone you like!

If you like the game please write a review and give us some stars, that's one of the things we love the most of creating games!

Also you can follow us on Facebook and twitter for more exciting content! :D

Enjoy Kabu San!
developers: NeverEnding Media S. de R.L., C.V.
publishers: Never Ending Media, S. de R.L., C.V
